text: Brian Medavoy (born June 30, 1965) is an American film and television producer, talent manager, entrepreneur and founder CEO of Movietopia Studios. He previously served as President of MGM Animation Studios. Franchise of Feral Child, Mine of the Survival, Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs, Captain Confederacy, VBirds, Captain Planet, Urban Wildlife, Super Spy Babysitting Caillou, Broadcastaway, The Magic School Bus and Wallace and Gromit's Grand Adventures He is the son of film producer and executive, Mike Medavoy. Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American movie producers
title: Brian Medavoy
